1: During a dance competition, a straight-faced father and his daughter took to the dance floor to perform for the judges. When the intro to Ben E King's "Stand By Me" starts playing, it's immediately clear that this isn't your average father-daughter dance. As the music begins to play, their feet slide across the floor and joy begins to erupt on their faces as they do what they love, together as a family. There is something very special about family members performing together and this video is probably one of the best father-daughter dances you are likely to see. MY HUSBAND LEFT ME WITH THE CHILDREN AND ALL THIS HEAVY LUGGAGE TO GO HOME WHILE HE WAS HERE WITH FRIENDS - A LESSON I TAUGHT HIM
After a wonderful family holiday with our two children, it was time to return home. My husband Tom said he would pick us up from the airport. But when we landed, there was no sign of him.
I called him and he dropped the bomb. He was hanging out with his old buddy Mike and told me to handle everything on my own. Like this. “Come on, it’s only for a few hours. You can handle it,” he replied.
